column1: #Text=They have no respect for - " Katara says : " Shhh !
#Text=" Aang says : " Why would anyone do this ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang , you did n't let this happen .
#Text=It has nothing to do with you .
#Text=It 's the Avatar 's job to protect nature .
#Text=But I do n't know how to do my job .
#Text=" Katara says : " That 's why we 're going to the North Pole .
#Text=But there 's no one who can teach me how to be the Avatar .
#Text=Monk Gyatso said that Avatar Roku would help me .
#Text=" Sokka says : " The Avatar before you ?
#Text=He died over a hundred years ago ; how are you supposed to talk to him ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I do n't know .
#Text=We 're closing in on the Avatar 's trail and I do n't want to lose him .
#Text=" Iroh says : " You look tired , Prince Zuko .
#Text=Why do n't you join me in these hot springs and soak away your troubles ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " My troubles can not be soaked away .
#Text=" Iroh says : " You should take your teacher 's advice and relax a little .
#Text=" Zuko says : " On second thought , why do n't you take another few minutes ?
#Text=But be back at the ship in a half - hour or I 'm leaving without you !
